definition: to read and re-read sth until one is familiar with it
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: Go on learning the text in groups , and translate.
sentences.chinese: 小組內自學課文，熟讀並翻譯。

sentences.english: Be sure to review the Information about the collection of the zebra mussel data.
sentences.chinese: 要保證熟讀有關收集斑馬貽貝數據的說明。

sentences.english: Even as a young boy, Jesus was already well acquainted with the Scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌在年少的時候，早就熟讀經文。

sentences.english: Read the words and copy them on P18.
sentences.chinese: 熟讀並抄寫第18頁的單詞。

sentences.english: Well, it's someone who reads Marx and Lenin .
sentences.chinese: 好，應該是一個熟讀馬克思和列寧的人。

sentences.english: Read and memorize the text on p45 and the rhyme on p50 (textbook).
sentences.chinese: 熟讀並背誦第45頁上的課文和第50頁的兒歌。

sentences.english: Be sure the Information about the collection of the zebra mussel data.
sentences.chinese: 要保證熟讀有關收集斑馬貽貝數據的說明。

sentences.english: A. Read the dialogue and try to remember.
Read Tang poetry 300 will not make poetry can alsochant.
sentences.chinese: 熟讀唐詩三百首，不會作詩也會吟。

sentences.english: Read the materials, remember the sentences and knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 熟讀聽力材料，記住重點句型。

sentences.english: No one can ever outgrow or neglect the Scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 再怎麼熟讀也不過份，當然，也沒有人可以忽略聖經。

sentences.english: I think I am going to read one poem from Tang Dynasty every day.
sentences.chinese: “熟讀唐詩三百首，不會作詩也會吟”。

sentences.english: Roscoe can read a profit and loss statement the way a symphonist reads a score .
sentences.chinese: 羅斯科研究盈方一覽表就象作曲家熟讀樂譜。

definition: Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty
the Hundred Schools of Thought, the various schools of thought and their exponents during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC)
Three Hundred Tang Poems, an anthology collected around 1763 by Sun Zhu 孫誅
to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
to neglect sleep and forget about food (idiom)/to skip one's sleep and meals/to be completely wrapped up in one's work
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
